rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with a reception area and built-in storage for coats.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: An open-plan living area that merges the kitchen and dining space. Large windows face east to capture morning sunlight, in line with Vastu principles for health and energy.

rooms.name: Contemporary Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen integrated with the living area; features an island counter for social interaction and efficient workflow.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A dedicated gym space designed with ample room for equipment and mirrors. Placed towards the west to harness balanced energy.

rooms.name: Garage/Carport Area
rooms.description: Spacious area accommodating two cars, with direct access to the living area for convenience and security. Designed in accordance with local building codes for residential garages.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen for storage of cleaning supplies and equipment, ensuring seamless service.

openings.description: Allows natural morning light and ventilation.
Main entrance door designed for secure access with modern design elements.
Provides daylight and ventilation to the kitchen area.
